page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = ReadBinary(Data BYREF as B [, Length as N [, Timeout as N [, ReadExact as L]]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Data
argument.description: The data received from the connection.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: Optional. Default = -1 (no limit). The number of bytes to read.

argument.name: Timeout
argument.description: Optional. Default = -1 (no timeout). The number of seconds before the method returns.

page.description: Read bytes from socket into a BLOB variable.
page.discussion: The INET::Socket::ReadBinary() method reads bytes from socket into a blob variable.
